name: 楊琇惠
objective:
本課程旨在讓學生認識中國及台灣本土的文學題材，熟悉各家的文學特色，進而懂得欣賞，並且能夠將之轉譯成文化符碼，靈活應用。然礙於文學作品繁多，課程時間有限，是以無法按照時間序，以史的方式一一介紹文學作品。是以為了避內容過於概論性或過於淺薄，本課程將以主題來進行教學。亦即依文類、時代、作家或風格來帶領同學由深而廣，逐漸培養同學賞析文學的能力。

本學期將以歌仔戲和報導文學為主軸來設計課程。
This course aims to introduce students to literary topics in China and Taiwan, familiarize them with the literary characteristics of various authors, and enable them to appreciate and translate them into cultural codes for flexible application. However, due to the vast number of literary works and limited course time, it is not possible to introduce literary works in a chronological or historical manner. Therefore, in order to avoid overly general or shallow content, this course will be taught thematically. That is, students will be guided from depth to breadth by literary genres, time periods, authors, or styles, gradually cultivating their ability to appreciate literature.
